title: BRIEF-Resolute Mining Says Syama Gold Mine In Mali Been Taken Offline
text:
BRIEF-Resolute Mining Says Syama Gold Mine In Mali Been Taken Offline

Stock Markets 35 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 22:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Resolute Mining Says Syama Gold Mine In Mali Been Taken Offline Oct 9 (Reuters) - Resolute Mining Ltd : * SYAMA SULPHIDE CIRCUIT UPDATE * SYAMA GOLD MINE IN MALI BEEN TAKEN OFFLINE DUE TO DETECTION OF CRACK IN MAIN EXTERNAL SHELL * CURRENTLY COOLING DOWN ROASTER TO ASSESS FULL EXTENT OF ISSUE AND IDENTIFY REMEDIAL ACTION REQUIRED * REPAIR TO CRACK MAY HAVE A MATERIAL IMPACT ON PRODUCTION FROM SYAMA SULPHIDE CIRCUIT FOR DECEMBER 2019 QUARTER.

BRIEF-Resolute Mining Says Syama Gold Mine In Mali Been Taken Offline
